That is between meтАжIn other words, dialectal variation in #Tulu primarily manifests along two axes - caste (Common vs Brahmin) &amp; region (North vs South). However, that's not to say it strictly follows this pattern. For ex, as mentioned earlier, North Common Tulu has many innovations unique to it.#Tulu dialectal variation is really interesting because some differences are specific to caste groups, others are regional. You have shared innovations in Common or Brahmin dialects (both North &amp; South), as well as ones shared by Common &amp; Brahmin dialects from the same region.RT @ShubhROfficial: No tom, dick, harry has right to decide if I am Brahmin, Kshatriya, Vaishya or Shudra at any moment.
